name: Splotches
description:
A bamboozlingly funtertaining puzzle game, lovingly crafted for artists of all ages. It's all about exploding globs of icky, gooey paint in the right places at the right times! Mix together the primary colors (red, yellow, and blue) in any order to make a Brownsplosion that obliterates everything in its path. Spread the colors across conveyor belts, through portals, over filters, and into buckets on your quest to destroy the mythical Rainbow Orb.

Features:
120 spluzzles ranging from easy-peasy to brainy-squeezy
A full-featured puzzle maker for endless creativity
12 unique puzzle elements to play with
30 minutes of chill tunes to solve by, from music wizard Johan Hargne
A fun way to learn the relationships of the color wheel
intro: The paint-mixing color puzzler with blorpy bloopy boomy blobs!
